title: Are you stressed? Your eyes may provide a window into your mental workload

title_detail.value: Are you stressed? Your eyes may provide a window into your mental workload

summary: With nearly breakneck speed, the demands of work productivity in today's society seem to have increased tenfold. Enter multitasking as a way to cope with the insistence that tasks be completed almost immediately. Previous studies on workload and productivity include physical aspects, such as how much a person walks or carries, but they do not take into account a person's state of mind. Now, researchers have discovered a person's eyes may offer a solution.
